turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hey, how is it going?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Im tired but it was a good long weekend.  How was yours?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Not bad at all, thanks. Just enjoyed the long weekend as well.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you consider yourself a compassionate person?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I do, but I also do not want to donate anything today. I really need the money...

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is okay I understand times are tough, but they could be tougher.  I think we get spoiled sometimes of the life we lead.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: For sure, but I am on the verge of being homeless and this is my only source of income.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: To be honest this is one of a few sources I have going but all are online.  Good luck to your future!  So I will donate some of my money today.  I was thinking about doing a dollar but now I am thinking I will give all of it.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I appreciate the support. I have a degree, just fell on a tough part in life. You can do that if you want, but I am keeping my full payment. Do you know where the donations go to?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Oh sorry I am not doing my part I forgot to tell you where they are going.  Are you aware of Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am not. Can you tell me more please?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They help out in 192 countries and counting.  Their main mission is to ensure children's rights to health, education, safety, etc.  There has been a lack of support for children in developing countries, especially in war zones. For instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is awful. Do you have any information on how much of the their funds go to the actual charity part versus the administration, staff, etc?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, about 9 out of 10 dollars go straight to the children while the other dollar would go to making sure that they can expand their capabilities and continue to help

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is a very good ratio. Not many charities that are famous to us do that.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is a very good ration and I love that they are transparent about it.  No pressure here but do you change your mind on donating?  Even if it is a small donation every penny will help these people in need

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I will donate 25 cents. I wish I could do more.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is okay, you rock!  The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children after the study is complete.  Have a good one

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You too, man.
